titles.title: A bill to provide for the treatment of Indian tribal governments under section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8825)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Treats Indian tribal governments and instrumentalities as employers with regard to any pension contract (under section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code) purchased in a plan year beginning before January 1, 1993.
